text:
@kayleighmcenany @realDonaldTrump But only 19,000 Lemmings get seats to catch a glimpse of the most destructive, divisive, immature, inarticulate Hate Hole to ever squat in our #WhiteHouse  

They'll also catch Covid-19 and pass it along to their families. Good job annihilating your own Followers!
